content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'CustomerPIIData' AND TYPE = 'U')
CREATE TABLE security.CustomerPIIData
	(
	 FirstName nvarchar(30),
	 LastName nvarchar(30),
	 CompanyName nvarchar(50),
	 Address nvarchar(40),
	 City nvarchar(30),
	 County nvarchar(30),
	 [State] nvarchar(5),
	 Zipcode bigint,
	 Phone1 nvarchar(30),
	 Phone2 nvarchar(30),
	 EmailId nvarchar(100),
	 SSN nvarchar(15)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹                 
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_CustomerPIIData
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO security.CustomerPIIData
(FirstName 1, LastName 2, CompanyName 3, Address 4, City 5, County 6, [State] 7, Zipcode 8, Phone1 9, Phone2 10, EmailId 11, SSN 12)
FROM 'https://synapsedemos.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/Customer PII Sample Data/Customer Sensitive Data.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,FIELDQUOTE = '"'
	,FIELDTERMINATOR = ','
	,FIRSTROW = 2
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://synapsedemos.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/'
	,IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM security.CustomerPIIData
GO
